quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Tree Hill and Lucas
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, hill, drama. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: The Tree Hill Ravens win the championship at the end of the Season One of One Tree Hill.
In Season One of One Tree Hill, who is the first team mate to treat Lucas like a member of the Ravens?
Who is Lucas best friend since childhood on the teen drama One Tree Hill?
What year did Behind the Music debut on VH1?
Who is the father figure in Lucas life in the hit teen series One Tree Hill?
At the beginning of Season One of One Tree Hill, who is Payton dating?
What is the relationship between Lucas and Nathan in Season One of the One Tree Hill TV series?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Half brothers

questions.question: Lucas is dating Brooke halfway through the fist season of the teen drama One Tree Hill. With whom does he cheat on Brooke?
Who was the narrator of Behind the Music?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jim Forbes

questions.question: Do Nathans parents get divorced in Season One of One Tree Hill?
Aqua Teen Hunger Force is a 15 minute show that airs on Cartoon Networks Adult Swim lineup. It is actually a spin-off from another Adult Swim show. What show did the Aqua Teens first appear on?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Space Ghost Coast 2 Coast

questions.question: In Season One of One Tree Hill, Nathan wants Hailey to tutor him so he can get to Lucas to torment him.
Who gets married at the end of Season One of the TV series One Tree Hill?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Nathan  Hailey

questions.question: The Tree Hill Ravens are a soccer team on the popular TV series One Tree Hill.
In the first season of the hit TV series One Tree Hill, Jake is late for practice a lot and the coach lets him off the hook. Why?

options.text: Jake has to take care of his mother, who is dying.
Jake is failing and needs tutoring after school.
Jake has a baby daughter that he is raising on his own.
Jake has cancer and needs to go to treatment.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jake has a baby daughter that he is raising on his own.

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Music and Kenan
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, stars. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What actor played Kenan on the show Kenan  Kel?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kenan Thompson

questions.question: Which of the following artists were featured on both Behind the Music and VH1 Legends in the period 1997-2006?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: John Lennon, Pink Floyd

questions.question: Which one of the following DID NOT happen on the show Kenan  Kel?

options.text: Kel ends up with two dates on the same day.
Kenan gets his head stuck in a fence.
Kel loses the winning lottery ticket.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kel ends up with two dates on the same day.

questions.question: What was Kenans sisters name on Kenan  Kel?
In one episode of the show Kenan  Kel, Kel ate an entire bicycle in order to win a prize in a contest.
Where did Kel work on the sitcom Kenan  Kel?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He didnt have a job.

questions.question: Where does the main character of the show Top Cat sleep?

options.text: on a park bench in the alley

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: in a garbage can

questions.question: Kenan and Kel get married in one episode of the self-titled show.
What was Kels favorite beverage on the show Kenan  Kel?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: orange soda

questions.question: These two Behind the Music stars, featured in 1997 and 1998 respectively, were pop teen idols in their day only to fall tragically short of their potential.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Andy Gibb and Leif Garrett

questions.question: In 1998, Behind the Music profiled this country/folk singer who died in 1997.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: John Denver

questions.question: Behind the Music was supposed to be a counter to another VH1 program called VH1 Legends.
What did Kenan shout, in almost every episode of Kenan  Ken, when something went wrong?
Who were the first 2 episodes of Behind the Music about?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: MC Hammer and Milli Vanilli

questions.question: How many episodes of the animated show Top Cat were aired on television?

questions.question: Why does Kyle from the series Kyle XY not have a belly button?

options.text: Because he was not nourished by a placenta
Because the placenta was attached elsewhere

questions.question: In the TV series Kyle XY, why is Josh reluctant to touch Andys breasts?

options.text: Because its their last day together

questions.question: What detective from the series The Wire went to the same school as Omar?

options.text: An old lady with a cane
An old man in a wheelchair
He wears a President Nixon mask

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: An old man in a wheelchair

questions.question: How did Kyle save Fosss life in the drama series Kyle XY?

options.text: By taking a bullet for him

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: By climbing a wall

questions.question: What article of clothing does the prosecutor insist Omar Little wear for the trial while on the stand?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A tie

questions.question: TV character Omar Little gets an unconditional Get Out of Jail Free card for his testimony.
What is Declans affectionate nickname for Lori in the TV series Kyle XY?

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Playing the piano.

In the show Top Cat, what part of New York City does the main character and his gang live in?

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Series and Combat
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, jason, buffy. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: The TV show Combat! depicted action that took place in which country (countries)?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: France only

questions.question: The last episode of the Combat! TV series showed the end of the war and the squad going home.
The squad member Caje from the Combat! TV series, was of what heritage?
Where did Kyle XY character Josh Trager get his marijuana?

options.text: From his online computer games buddy

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: From his parents

questions.question: In the Combat! TV series, what was Saunders’ first name?
Doc was the only regular squad member to survive all episodes of the Combat! TV series without being wounded
In the episode of the Buffy series, titled Dead Mans Party, what is the name of the neighbor that had been helping Joyce cope with Buffys departure?
Hanley, played by Rick Jason, had the rank of Captain throughout most of the Combat! TV series.
Who was the tallest man in the squad on the TV show Combat?
In Anne, the season 3 premiere, Buffy the Vampire Slayer has taken a job as what?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A waitress

questions.question: What was Sgt. Saunders’ main weapon in the Combat! TV series?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Thompson sub-machine gun

questions.question: How many Combat! seasons were filmed in color?
In the Combat! TV series, Doc, played by Steven Rogers in season 1 and Conlan Carter in seasons 2-6, carried only a .45 caliber pistol for protection.
What is the first thing Kyle from the series Kyle XY says when he goes to live with the Tragers?

options.text: He tells Mrs. Trager he loves her.
He yells in pain when Josh steps on his foot.
He says hes sorry for spilling the milk.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He asks for juice.

questions.question: On the Combat! TV show, Sgt. Saunders’ helmet was unusual in what way?

options.text: It had a small hole in the right side.
It was a camouflage helmet, not used in Europe.
It had a small peace sign on the back.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: It was a camouflage helmet, not used in Europe.

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Episode and Buffy
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, buffy, angel. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In the episode Choices, Buffy the Vampire Slayer is accepted at which university?

In the Buffy episode Graduation Day Part One, as the Mayor prepares for his ascension (a ceremony in which he will become 100% pure demon and destroy Sunnydale in the process), Faith is taking care of other business. What is she doing?

options.text: She shoots Angel with a poisoned arrow

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: She shoots Angel with a poisoned arrow

questions.question: In the Buffy episode The Zeppo, Xander defeats a group of zombies trying to blow up the high school single-handedly.

In the episode Earshot, Buffy the Vampire Slayer is exposed to demon blood and develops the ability to read minds. She discovers someone at the school is plotting to kill several people. Who was the culprit?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Lunch Lady

questions.question: In the episode of the Buffy series, Lovers Walk, Oz and Cordelia catch Xander and Willow kissing each other
In the episode Homecoming, Buffy the Vampire Slayer and Cordelia are at each others throats. Why?

options.text: They are both running for Homecoming Queen.
Cordelia thinks Buffy stole Xander from her.
Buffy is jealous of Cordelias popularity.
Cordelia thinks Buffy can bake better than she can.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: They are both running for Homecoming Queen.

questions.question: Buffy the Vampire Slayers mom (Joyce) and her watcher (Giles) have sex in the episode Band Candy.
In the episode of the Buffy series, entitled Beauty and the Beasts, Angel returns.
Who taught Gabrielle to use her staff in the series Xena: Warrior Princess?

options.text: Who knows, she had the skill from the beginning

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ephiny, the Amazon

In the episode of the Buffy series, The Wish, actress Emma Caulfield makes her first appearance as Anyanka (later shortened to Anya). What was her job?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Vengeance Demon

questions.question: What is the name of the woman claiming to be Faiths new watcher in the Buffy episode Revelations?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gwendolyn Post

questions.question: In the episode of the Buffy series, Gingerbread, Amy turns herself into this animal to escape a witch-hunting mob.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A rat

questions.question: What is the name of the evil being assaulting Angel in the episode of the Buffy show, titled Amends?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The First Evil

questions.question: In the episode Graduation Day Part two, how does Buffy the Vampire Slayer defeat the demonified mayor Wilkins?

options.text: She lures him into the school and blows it up.
She convinces him he cannot win.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: She lures him into the school and blows it up.

questions.question: The Thundercats once appeared in a comic book with Captain America.
What is the name of Barbaras sister on the TV show Big Love?
Gabrielle, one of the characters featured in Xena: Warrior Princes, is an only child.
During the Xena episode Comedy of Eros, Gabrielle was shot with Cupids arrow and fell madly in love with Joxer.
By the end of the Xena series, Xena finally taught Gabrielle how to do the pinch.
The company that produced the Thundercats also produced such classics as Rudolph the Red Nosed Reindeer, Frosty the Snowman and Santa Claus Is Coming to Town.
On the TV drama Big Love, Barbara has two kids.

questions.question: How many episodes of the animated series Thundercats were produced?
In what year was the series Thundercats created?
In the 80s cartoon Thundercats what was the name of Lion-Os sword?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sword of Omens

questions.question: Who did Jack shoot in the kneecap for information in Season Five of 24?
Gabrielle from the series Xena: Warrior Princess finally married. What was her husbands name?

options.text: Perdicas, a boy from her hometown that she was promised to.
Orion, a young bard she met while competing for a spot at Athens City Academy of the Performing Bards

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Perdicas, a boy from her hometown that she was promised to.

questions.question: What creature wasnt Gabrielle turned into during the course of the series Xena:Warrior Princess?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A Valkyrie

questions.question: In the episode of the Xena series The Quill is Mightier how does Gabrielle finally end the curse of the enchanted scroll?

options.text: The Scroll was filled and all was right with the world (or at least back to normal).
The Scroll was burned in a fire, leaving only ashes and nothing left to write on.
The Scroll was torn in shreds making it useless.
The Scroll remains enchanted and is highlighted in the episode The Xena Scrolls.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Scroll was filled and all was right with the world (or at least back to normal).
